instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates signal generation for testing: pinkish, pinker, noise, gausstrig, dust, dust2
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; pinkish opcode: ares pinkish kamp [, imethod] [, iseed]
    ; Pink noise (1/f spectrum)
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; imethod - generation method
    
    kAmp linseg 0.2, p3*0.5, 0.5, p3*0.5, 0.2
    aPink pinkish kAmp
    
    outs aPink, aPink
endin

instr 2
    ; pinker opcode: ares pinker kamp [, iseed]
    ; Alternative pink noise generator
    
    kAmp = 0.3
    aPink pinker kAmp
    
    ; Filter for testing filter response
    aFilt butterlp aPink, 2000
    
    outs aPink*0.5, aFilt*0.5
endin

instr 3
    ; noise opcode: ares noise kamp, kbeta
    ; Colored noise generator
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kbeta - spectral slope (0=white, 1=pink, 2=brown)
    
    kAmp = 0.3
    
    ; White noise (beta=0)
    aWhite noise kAmp, 0
    
    ; Pink noise (beta=1)
    aPink noise kAmp, 1
    
    ; Brown/red noise (beta=2)
    aBrown noise kAmp, 2
    
    ; Sweep through noise colors
    kBeta linseg 0, p3, 2
    aSwept noise kAmp, kBeta
    
    outs aWhite*0.3, aSwept*0.5
endin

instr 4
    ; gausstrig opcode: ares gausstrig kamp, kcps, kdev [, iseed]
    ; Gaussian-distributed random impulses
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kcps - average rate (Hz)
    ; kdev - deviation
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    kCps = 8  ; 8 impulses per second on average
    kDev = 0.3  ; Deviation
    
    aImpulses gausstrig kAmp, kCps, kDev
    
    ; Ring through filter
    aRing butterbp aImpulses, 800, 50
    
    outs aImpulses*0.5, aRing*0.7
endin

instr 5
    ; dust opcode: ares dust kamp, kcps [, iseed]
    ; Random impulses at average density
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kcps - average rate (Hz)
    
    kAmp = 0.6
    kCps linseg 5, p3*0.5, 50, p3*0.5, 10
    
    aDust dust kAmp, kCps
    
    ; Use as trigger for synthesis
    aEnv expsega 0.001, 0.001, 1, 0.05, 0.001
    aOsc oscili aEnv*0.3, 440, -1
    
    aTrig = aDust * aOsc
    
    outs aDust*0.3, aTrig*0.7
endin

instr 6
    ; dust2 opcode: ares dust2 kamp, kcps [, iseed]
    ; Bipolar random impulses
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kcps - average rate (Hz)
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    kCps = 20
    
    aDust2 dust2 kAmp, kCps
    
    ; Use as modulation source
    aCarr oscili 0.3, 440, -1
    aMod = aCarr * (1 + aDust2)
    
    outs aDust2*0.4, aMod*0.6
endin

instr 7
    ; Testing with multiple noise sources
    ; Compare different noise colors
    
    ; White noise
    aWhite rand 0.2
    
    ; Pink noise
    aPink pinkish 0.2
    
    ; Brown noise
    aBrown noise 0.2, 2
    
    ; Crossfade between them
    kCF linseg 0, p3*0.33, 1, p3*0.33, 2, p3*0.34, 0
    
    aMix = (kCF < 0.5 ? aWhite : \
           (kCF < 1.5 ? aPink : aBrown))
    
    outs aMix, aMix
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

i1 0 3
i2 4 3
i3 8 4
i4 13 3
i5 17 3
i6 21 3
i7 25 4

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>
